title: Schools and nursery schools rated good or outstanding

versions.title: Schools and nursery schools rated good or outstanding
versions.summary: Percentage of state-funded schools that are rated good or outstanding
versions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of state-funded Nursery schools, Primary schools, Secondary schools, Alternative Provision (AP) schools and Special schools that are rated good or outstanding.
